outputs.output_descr:
Output 1:  Newly established State Directorate on Rehabilitation and Further Development of Osh and Jalal-Abad cities is able to lead the recovery and reconciliation process efficiently and effec-tively;
Output 2:  Clear post-conflict needs assessment done, general plans of Osh and Jalal-Abad cities, post recovery strategy and action plans of communities' restoration developed
Output 3: Capacity of State Directorate to assess citizens' needs on restoration of their legal doc-uments and effective collaboration with Public Registration Service strengthened and enhanced 
Output 4: Security, trust and confidence built through enhancement of dialogue between local communities, the State Directorate and local authorities and involvement of local communities into the restoration and reconciliation processes.

project_descr: Capacity building of the State Directorate for early recovery post-crisis needs assessment, recovery planning and restoration of Osh and Jalal-Abad cities of the Kyrgyz Republic
project_title: Capacity building of the State Directorate
